header.subtitle: Build a Stronger Team, One Stroke at a Time.
header.description: Experience the ultimate team-building activity on Pancharevo Lake with HackRowing.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: HackRowing was founded on the principle that the discipline, persistence, and collaborative effort inherent in rowing are directly transferable to the professional world. We offer a distinctive team-building experience where participants learn that peak performance comes not from individual strength, but from the perfect synchronicity of a cohesive team.

objectives.title: What Your Team Will Achieve
objectives.description: Our program is designed for lasting impact on team dynamics, community, and personal growth.

points.title: Enhance Team Cohesion
points.text: Build stronger connections in a dynamic environment that promotes an active lifestyle and true collaboration.

points.title: Promote Rowing in Bulgaria
points.text: Increase the accessibility of this amazing sport, encouraging broader participation among the public and youth.

points.title: Support Community Development
points.text: All proceeds are reinvested into the NSA Rowing Club to improve facilities and support Bulgaria's future athletes.

details.title: Our Proven Program Format
details.description: This structure is tested and highly effective, but we can customize it to fit your needs.
details.disclaimer: *We are flexible and will gladly adapt the program format to your company's specific needs and timeline.

steps.title: Session 1: The Foundation
steps.text: An on-land introduction to rowing technique using Concept 2 ergometers to build core skills.

steps.title: Session 2: First Splash
steps.text: The first hands-on session on the water, applying learned techniques in stable, multi-person boats.

steps.title: Session 3: Finding Rhythm
steps.text: Continued on-water practice focusing on developing team synchronicity and communication.

steps.title: Session 4: Refining Technique
steps.text: Advanced coaching to improve crew efficiency, power, and speed.

steps.title: Session 5: Race Preparation
steps.text: Crews practice starts and race pace, solidifying their teamwork under pressure.

steps.title: Session 6: The Finale
steps.text: A friendly regatta between crews, followed by a closing ceremony with certificates and celebration.
